Dandelion Seed.In-game Description: A tiny seed that rides on the wind. Even without its feathered wings, it still holds the hope from afar within.

Wolfhook.In-game Description: A berry with thorns that often gets attached to a wolf's pelt. When you look at it, you can almost hear the echoing cries of the wolves in the woods.

Violetgrass.In-game Description: A small flower with strong vitality. It was said its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

Jueyun Chili.In-game Description: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

Cor Lapis.In-game Description: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."

Cecilia.In-game Description: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.

Starconch.In-game Description: Empty seashells brought ashore by the tides. Hold it close to your ear, and hear the longing calls of the sea.

Small Lamp Grass.In-game Description: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.

Noctilucous Jade.In-game Description: A rare mineral that glimmers in the dark. It's said to be a mutated gemstone condensed from the flourishing elements of the world.

Valberry.In-game Description: A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet refreshing taste. In the past, The watchers of the storms found solace in the sweetness of the fruit and the hope for the city's security.

Philanemo Mushroom.In-game Description: A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.

Glaze Lily.In-game Description: An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.

Silk Flower.In-game Description: A crimson flower that blooms like the rainbow clouds in Liyue. It can be made into silky-smooth fabric.

Calla Lily.In-game Description: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

Windwheel Aster.In-game Description: A plant that adores the wind. To the proud children of the wind, or the citizens of Mondstadt, the Windwheel Asters are the "visible winds."

Qingxin.In-game Description: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.
